title: Towards new horizons
creator_credit: Educational Films of Scotland, Park Film Studios and Douglas Gray
brief_description: Against a backdrop of Scottish mountains, rivers, lochs and seas, shows favourite youth activities available in Scotland. Skiing, cycling, pony trekking, camping and climbing are included.
